Hi Guys/Gals, 
I have listed another sword and dropped the price of another. 
One is a high quality Gendai-to, and the other is a beautiful 28 inch Bizen katana, yes it is probably gimei but easily worth the money as it is outstanding. 
Please have a look and don't hesitate to ask questions. 
http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/mat/yokoyama.html 
and 
http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/mat/tomomaru.html 
 
Regards 
Louis
